metadata.title: CVE-2018-20802 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries with compound indexes affectingQueryPlanner. This issue affects MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to3.6.9 and MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.3.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
